subject: Unable to Access Online Banking
body:
Hello Support Team,

I have been unable to log into my online banking account for the past 2 days. I keep getting an "Invalid credentials" error even though I'm certain my password is correct.

Account Number: ACC-2020-6655
Username: lisathompson88

I tried the "Forgot Password" option but I'm not receiving the reset email. I checked my spam folder as well.

This is urgent as I need to pay some bills this week. Can you please help me regain access to my account?

Thank you,
Lisa Thompson
Phone: (555) 222-3333
